points: Co-founded an innovative IT startup, guiding the company's vision and strategy while building high quality applications and managing a cross-functional tech team to work in fast-paced environment.
Developed a comprehensive B2B e-commerce web application, enhancing user experience and streamlining the online quotation process, resulting in 30% increase in orders.
Spearheaded the design and development of a prototype for a social community web application to glean market insights about creator economy.

Strategically drove the adoption and implementation of a microservices architecture, leveraging the Agile Scrum framework, RESTful web services to to enhance software development processes and delivery.

Engineered a feature integrating Node.js and React.js with PassKit-Generator, enabling users to add tickets to Apple and Google wallets, which simplified access and reduced ticket retrieval time by over 30%.
Collaborated with team to build React-Native cross-platform scanner mobile app to expedite entry processes in clubs, slashing average admission time by streamlining the check-in procedure.
Implemented two token-based authentication mechanisms using JWT, resulting in seamless user experience and enhanced security.
Revamped and optimized Node.js API backend code, significantly enhancing performance and maintainability.
